title: May the floss be with you! Binding bids due for Abano
text:
It’s been a bit like pulling teeth, but the race for up-for-sale Trans Tasman dental business Abano Healthcare is in its final furlong.

Sources said a new owner for Abano, which is advised by Rothschild and Cameron Partners, was on track to be unveiled in the next fortnight with Abano's suitors preparing to submit binding offers.

BGH Capital and Queensland-based dentistry group 1300 Smiles are firming up their proposals for Abano Healthcare. Craig Abraham

To recap, Australian buyout firm BGH Capital has been in exclusive talks with Abano and its bankers to acquire the company in full, while ASX-listed group 1300 Smiles is exclusive on the Australian business, known as Maven Dental Group.

The smart money has been on First NZ Capital-advised BGH to take Abano in full. It would be cleaner for all concerned.

The fact BGH secured exclusivity on the entire company was seen as a good sign that its offer was pitched at a substantial premium to Abano’s trading price and worthy of endorsement by the board.
description: It’s been a bit like pulling teeth, but the race to buy dental business Abano Healthcare is in its final furlong.
